body_html:
Could you run which bazel
It looks like you have two different bazel installations.

Your bazel log says

Building with --config=cuda but TensorFlow is not configured to build with GPU support. Please re-run ./configure and enter 'Y' at the prompt to build with GPU support.

Could you retry running ./configure and see if it helps.
body_text:
Could you run which bazel
It looks like you have two different bazel installations.
Your bazel log says
Building with --config=cuda but TensorFlow is not configured to build with GPU support. Please re-run ./configure and enter 'Y' at the prompt to build with GPU support.

Could you retry running ./configure and see if it helps.
body:
Could you run `which bazel`
It looks like you have two different bazel installations. 

Your bazel log says
```
Building with --config=cuda but TensorFlow is not configured to build with GPU support. Please re-run ./configure and enter 'Y' at the prompt to build with GPU support.
```
Could you retry running `./configure` and see if it helps.
